How Crowdfunding Works?

Decided to raise funds? Pat yourself on the back. Still have doubts? Watch This!

Follow these simple steps and start raising in a few minutes.

Start your fundraiser

It’ll take only 2 minutes. Just tell us a few details about you and the ones you are raising funds for.



Share your fundraiser

All you need to do is share the fundraiser with your friends and family. In no time, support will start pouring in.



Withdraw Funds

The funds raised can be withdrawn without any hassle directly to your bank account.

FAQs

To Start a Fundraiser, follow the three steps:
1. Sign up on oporajoy
2. Fill up the form
3. Hit Submit

Yes, you can also raise funds for a friend, a loved one or anyone in need during life's crucial moments

With Oporajoy, the money you collect goes directly to the bank account associated with your fundraising page. Raising money for yourself or anyone has never been easier.

Your Oporajoy fundraiser features the very best in secure payment encryption technology. Not only are your donors online payments safe, your money is stored securely until you're ready to request a withdrawal via electronic bank transfer.

No problem. You will still receive the raised amount after the transactional processing fee. To know more about transactional processing fee, visit: www.oporajoy.org/plans-and-pricing

You can write to info@oporajoy.org Know someone who needs funds for medical treatment urgently? Help them out by sharing this information with them.
